label: Countdown_From
text: Isabelle

label: Countdown_Msg
text:
★ Countdown Fun! ★
All's well that ends well, or so the
saying goes. On New Year's Eve,
come gather together in the plaza.
We'll ring in the new year with a
grand Countdown!

label: Fireworks1_From
text: Tom Nook

label: Fireworks1_Msg
text:
★ Upcoming Fireworks Shows! ★
I hope you'll join us every Sunday
in August for a fireworks show!
We'll get things started at 7 PM
when it's dark enough. Come and
join in the fun, hm? Yes, yes!

label: FishingConventionAutumn_From
text: Isabelle

label: FishingConventionAutumn_Msg
text:
★ Upcoming Fishing Tourney ★
I know you've all been waiting for
this... Fishing Tourney! Saturday!
Z#촀 Z$촀! Don't miss out on
a chance to earn amazing prizes!

label: FishingConventionSpring_Msg
text:

There's a Fishing Tourney planned
for Saturday, Z#촀 Z$촀.
I heard there are prizes if you can

label: FishingConventionSummer_From
text: Isabelle

label: FishingConventionSummer_Msg
text:
★ Upcoming Fishing Tourney ★
On Saturday, Z#촀 Z$촀, our
island Fishing Tourney takes place!
There are wonderful prizes if you
earn a lot of points. I hope you're

label: FishingConventionWinter_From
text: Isabelle

label: FishingConventionWinter_Msg
text:
★ Upcoming Fishing Tourney ★
On Saturday, Z#촀 Z$촀,
we'll have a Fishing Tourney. It'll be
chilly out, so bundle up. I don't
want any of you catching a cold!

label: Halloween_From
text: Tom Nook

label: Halloween_Msg
text:
★ Halloween Party News ★
October 31st is Halloween, and
we'll be kicking off our festivities
at 5 PM sharp. Yes, yes! I hope
to see all of you there...and don't
forget to bring candy!

label: MayDay_From
text: Tom Nook

label: MayDay_Msg
text:
★ May Day Is Coming! ★
May 1st is May Day, and we're
giving you a special travel ticket as
a gift! Swing by Resident Services
between May 1st and 7th to get it!
